Format an SVG string with labels and colors.

Parameters:
Name Type Description

The names for the label.
colors Array.<integer>

The colors for each label.

The x, y, and z location of the label.

with the text to be shown on screen.

Hexadecimal base that represents the color of the text.

Name Type Description

The x, y and z coordinates of one of the ends of the line.

color integer

Hexadecimal base that specifies the color of the line.
width float

The width of the line being drawn.
transparent boolean

Whether the line will be transparent or not.
